name: Mario DE VERA, petitioner, v. UNITED AIRLINES, INC.
name_abbreviation: De Vera v. United Airlines, Inc.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Mario DE VERA, petitioner,
v.
UNITED AIRLINES, INC.
attorneys: Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. Petitioner allowed until October 22, 2018, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.
casebody.head_matter:
Mario DE VERA, petitioner,
v.
UNITED AIRLINES, INC.
No. 17-8719.
Supreme Court of the United States
Oct. 1, 2018.
Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. Petitioner allowed until October 22, 2018, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.
